title: Visiting Japan, Top U.S. Envoys Set Combative Tone for China Talks
content:
1. Visiting Japan, Top U.S. Envoys Set Combative Tone for China Talks  The New York Times
  2. US and Japan express concern over China's 'aggressive actions' during first trip by Biden's top diplomat  CNN
  3. Blinken Says China Is Acting Aggressively and Repressively  U.S. News & World Report
  4. Japan Defense and Foreign Ministers Meet U.S. Counterparts  TIME
  5. In Tokyo, Blinken And Austin Work To Revive Asian Alliance To Counter China  NPR
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 访日的美国高层特使为中国谈判定下战斗基调。
訪日的美國高層特使爲中國談判定下戰鬥基調。
